item.description:
Just Added - From the Boston Red Sox, Rehearsal spots have been added for Tuesday morning. E Mail Jodi Purdy-Quinlan at sscastingredsox@gmail.com or Ricky Vazquez at rvazquez@redsox.com to be added to the list. If you are picked, a confirmation will be sent from them. 

Are you a Red Sox fan that wants to help the Red Sox prepare for the 100th Anniversary Celebration of Fenway Park?

Time is Tuesday at 9:00 am to 11:00 am .

You would wear warm clothes and sneakers.

You may bring Adult friends over 5 feet tall.
item.how_to_find_us: Confidential Confirmation E Mails to selected people will be sent from South Shore Casting. Please follow instructions.
item.name: Just AddedRed Sox in need of Stand-Ins to help with 100th Anniversary Rehearsals
